errors.error_description: The command for installing with conda is incorrect. It incorrectly uses `conda-forge` as the command instead of specifying it as the channel for the `conda install` command.
correction_candidates: Change the command to "$ conda install plotnine --from conda-forge".
Change the command to "$ conda install -c conda-forge plotnine".
Change the command to "$ pip install plotnine -f https://conda.anaconda.org/conda-forge/".
Change the command to "$ conda install anaconda/plotnine".
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to "$ conda install -c conda-forge plotnine".
